items.title: Bluetti offers a second-chance window to grab the Handsfree backpack power stations with 100W panels from a $399 low, more
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Bluetti Winter Backup Sale, the brand is once again offering the same collection of flash bundle deals at up to 47% off through tomorrow night. This gives you another window to pick up the Bluetti Handsfree 1 Backpack Power Station with a 100W solar panel at $399 shipped, which comes in $50 under the current Amazon pricing. Dropping back down from a full $629 rate, we saw this same offer last week during the previous phase of flash sales, giving you another chance to take advantage of a $130 markdown and grab it for your outdoor adventures at the lowest price we have tracked. You’ll also find the Handsfree 2 Backpack Power Station with a 100W solar panel at its second-lowest price of $499 shipped, as well as the larger 1,536Wh AC240 Power Station and a 200W solar panel at $1,199 shipped (matching at Amazon), it’s third-lowest price after falling from a $1,899 full rate.
